amendment.description: Amendment sought to establish a National Affordable Housing Grant Fund program within the HOME program, which is currently administered through the U.S. Department of Housing and Urban Development.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 110-369 to establish a National Affordable Housing Grant Fund program within the HOME program, which is currently administered through the U.S. Department of Housing and Urban Development.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Neugebauer amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 163 - 257 (Roll no. 956).
